metadata.name: 24 hours in Tokyo #1/50
metadata.description:
"24 Hours in Tokyo" is my way to give back to all of those collectors who have supported the "Seconds of Life" collection. 

Each edition unlocks a physical screen that will have a custom-tailored version of their 1/1 piece which will be displayed on it perpetually.

As always I'm deeply grateful for your support, and I hope that this unlockable brings a part of Japan and my art to your home.

Ilan Derech

Title: 24 hours in Tokyo  
By: Ilan Derech  
Location: Kyoto, Japan  
Shot on: Leica M7 & ZEISS ZM 1.4/35  
Film: KODAK PORTRA 400  
Year: 2022
